message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $10,000. It's a great deal for a product worth significantly more. Let me know what you think!
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?

Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal, but $9,000 is still a bit low for me.  I'm willing to come down to $9,500. This is a fair price that allows us both to get a good deal.  Let me know your thoughts.
I appreciate your willingness to come down to $9,500, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $9,200?
